name: Slimecing
description:
You are a slime and you fight other slimes in an intense fencing match. This is a local multiplayer game so you must need at least two people and at least one controller. The game only supports three people at the moment.

Known bugs: 

- There is a spawn glitch on start, working on fixing that now. Work around is to just pick the same level you played last time on second round and spawning will work.

- Player moves by itself on player disconnect
